languages.text: {n}Гремя латами, один из рыцарей выходит вперед.{/n} "Я Лукра Воевода, комендант крепости, и своей головой ручаюсь, что богопротивные мутанты были скованы по всем правилам. Это Фесмофориус... от его дыма твари совсем обезумели!"

{n}His armour rattling, one of the knights steps forward.{/n} "I am Lucra, commander of the fortress. I can attest that the ungodly mutants were restrained properly. It's the Phesmophorius... The smoke whipped the brutes into a frenzy!"
languages.original_text: {n}Гремя латами, один из рыцарей выходит вперед.{/n} "Я Лукра Воевода, комендант крепости, и своей головой ручаюсь, что богопротивные мутанты были скованы по всем правилам. Это Фесмофориус... от его дыма твари совсем обезумели!"

traits.locale_text: {n}His armour rattling, one of the knights steps forward.{/n} "I am Turgulak Grumes, commander of the fortress. I can attest that the ungodly mutants were restrained properly. It's the Phesmophorius... The smoke whipped the brutes into a frenzy!"

{n}His armour rattling, one of the knights steps forward.{/n} "I am Lucra, commander of the fortress. I can attest that the ungodly mutants were restrained properly. It's the Phesmophorius... The smoke whipped the brutes into a frenzy!"

{n}His armour rattling, one of the knights steps forward.{/n} "I am Lucra, commander of the fortress. I can attest that the ungodly mutants were restrained properly. It's the Phesmophorius... The smoke whipped the brutes into a frenzy!"

languages.text: {n}一位骑士走了过来，盔甲咯吱作响。{/n}“我是这座要塞的指挥官卢卡拉。我可以向您保证，那些邪恶的变种人已经得到了妥善监禁。是菲斯摩弗瑞斯的问题……是它喷出来的浓烟，让那些渣滓发了疯！”
languages.original_text: {n}His armour rattling, one of the knights steps forward.{/n} "I am Lucra, commander of the fortress. I can attest that the ungodly mutants were restrained properly. It's the Phesmophorius... The smoke whipped the brutes into a frenzy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}一位骑士走了过来，盔甲咯吱作响。{/n}“我是这座要塞的指挥官卢卡拉。我可以向您保证，那些邪恶的变种人已经得到了妥善监禁。是菲斯摩弗瑞斯的问题……是它喷出来的浓烟，让那些渣滓发了疯！”
{n}一位骑士走了过来，盔甲咯吱作响。{/n}“我是这座要塞的指挥官图古拉克·格鲁姆斯。我可以向您保证，那些邪恶的变种人已经得到了妥善监禁。是菲斯摩弗瑞斯的问题……是它喷出来的浓烟，让那些渣滓发了疯！”

languages.text: {n}Uno de los caballeros da un paso al frente con su traqueteante armadura.{/n} «Soy Lucra, comandante de la fortaleza. Puedo aseverar que esos odiosos mutantes estaban retenidos adecuadamente. Ha sido el fesmoforio... las bestias enloquecieron al captar el olor de la humareda».
languages.original_text: {n}His armour rattling, one of the knights steps forward.{/n} "I am Lucra, commander of the fortress. I can attest that the ungodly mutants were restrained properly. It's the Phesmophorius... The smoke whipped the brutes into a frenzy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Uno de los caballeros da un paso al frente con su traqueteante armadura.{/n} «Soy Lucra, comandante de la fortaleza. Puedo aseverar que esos odiosos mutantes estaban retenidos adecuadamente. Ha sido el fesmoforio... las bestias enloquecieron al captar el olor de la humareda».

{n}Uno de los caballeros da un paso al frente con su traqueteante armadura.{/n} «Soy Turgulak Grumes, comandante de la fortaleza. Puedo aseverar que esos odiosos mutantes estaban retenidos adecuadamente. Ha sido el fesmoforio... las bestias enloquecieron al captar el olor de la humareda».

languages.text: {n}Zırhı takırdayan şövalyelerden biri öne çıkıyor.{/n} "Ben Lucra, kalenin komutanıyım. O dinsiz mutantların düzgün bir şekilde zapt edildiğine şahitlik edebilirim. Bu Pesmoforyus'un işi... Dumanı, vahşileri çılgına çevirdi!"
languages.original_text: {n}His armour rattling, one of the knights steps forward.{/n} "I am Lucra, commander of the fortress. I can attest that the ungodly mutants were restrained properly. It's the Phesmophorius... The smoke whipped the brutes into a frenzy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Zırhı takırdayan şövalyelerden biri öne çıkıyor.{/n} "Ben Lucra, kalenin komutanıyım. O dinsiz mutantların düzgün bir şekilde zapt edildiğine şahitlik edebilirim. Bu Pesmoforyus'un işi... Dumanı, vahşileri çılgına çevirdi!"

{n}Zırhı takırdayan şövalyelerden biri öne çıkıyor.{/n} "Ben Turgulak Grumes, kalenin komutanıyım. O dinsiz mutantların düzgün bir şekilde zapt edildiğine şahitlik edebilirim. Bu Pesmoforyus'un işi... Dumanı, vahşileri çılgına çevirdi!"

languages.text: {n}騎士の一人がそのアーマーをガタガタという音を立てながら前に出る。{/n}「私はルクラ、フォートレスの司令官です。私は邪悪な変異体を適切に拘束していたと断言できます。フェスモフォリウスが…その煙がけだものを煽って狂乱させたのです！」
languages.original_text: {n}His armour rattling, one of the knights steps forward.{/n} "I am Lucra, commander of the fortress. I can attest that the ungodly mutants were restrained properly. It's the Phesmophorius... The smoke whipped the brutes into a frenzy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}騎士の一人がそのアーマーをガタガタという音を立てながら前に出る。{/n}「私はタルガラク・グルメス、フォートレスの司令官です。私は邪悪な変異体を適切に拘束していたと断言できます。フェスモフォリウスが…その煙がけだものを煽って狂乱させたのです！」
{n}騎士の一人がそのアーマーをガタガタという音を立てながら前に出る。{/n}「私はタルガラク・グルメス、フォートレスの司令官です。私は邪悪な変異体を適切に拘束していたと断言できます。フェスモフォリウスが…その煙がけだものを煽って狂乱させたのです！」

languages.text: {n}L'un des chevaliers en armure s'avance d'un pas dans un grand bruit de ferraille.{/n} « Lucra, commandant de la forteresse, à votre service. Je vous garantis sur mon honneur que les mutants impies étaient entravés comme il se doit. C'est le Phesmophorius... La fumée a rendu ces brutes complètement folles ! »
languages.original_text: {n}His armour rattling, one of the knights steps forward.{/n} "I am Lucra, commander of the fortress. I can attest that the ungodly mutants were restrained properly. It's the Phesmophorius... The smoke whipped the brutes into a frenzy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'un des chevaliers en armure s'avance d'un pas dans un grand bruit de ferraille.{/n} « Lucra, commandant de la forteresse, à votre service. Je vous garantis sur mon honneur que les mutants impies étaient entravés comme il se doit. C'est le Phesmophorius... La fumée a rendu ces brutes complètement folles ! »

{n}L'un des chevaliers en armure s'avance d'un pas dans un grand bruit de ferraille.{/n} « Turgulak Grumes, commandant de la forteresse, à votre service. Je vous garantis sur mon honneur que les mutants impies étaient entravés comme il se doit. C'est le Phesmophorius... La fumée a rendu ces brutes complètement folles ! »

languages.text: {n}Einer der Ritter tritt mit klappernder Rüstung vor.{/n} "Ich bin Lucra, Kommandant der Festung. Ich kann bestätigen, dass die gottlosen Mutanten ordnungsgemäß gefesselt waren. Es liegt am Phesmophorius ... Der Rauch hat diese Grobiane rasend gemacht!"
languages.original_text: {n}His armour rattling, one of the knights steps forward.{/n} "I am Lucra, commander of the fortress. I can attest that the ungodly mutants were restrained properly. It's the Phesmophorius... The smoke whipped the brutes into a frenzy!"

{n}Einer der Ritter tritt mit klappernder Rüstung vor.{/n} "Ich bin Turgulak Grumes, Kommandant der Festung. Ich kann bestätigen, dass die gottlosen Mutanten ordnungsgemäß gefesselt waren. Es liegt am Phesmophorius ... Der Rauch hat diese Grobiane rasend gemacht!"
